seller_description: Capture and share your cherished moments with the Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame, designed to keep loved ones connected effortlessly. Featuring a 10.1-inch IPS HD touch screen with a resolution of 1280x800, this frame delivers crystal-clear visuals from any angle, ensuring your photos and videos look vibrant and detailed. The FRAMEO app for iOS and Android allows you to securely send photos and 15-second videos from anywhere in the world, making it easy to share memories with family and friends. With 32GB of built-in memory and support for Micro SD cards, you can conveniently import, export, and extend your storage.The Akimart digital frame offers versatile features, including automatic photo rotation, a detachable stand for portrait or landscape mode, and options to display captions, weather updates, and a clock. Customizable settings such as play order, image zooming, brightness adjustment, sleep mode, and hide/publish images enhance the user experience. Its intuitive touch interface ensures effortless setup and operation, making it suitable for all ages.Perfect for gifting on special occasions like birthdays, weddings, or family gatherings, the Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame transforms your photos into a dynamic display of treasured memories, bringing joy to every corner of your home.
review: I couldn’t love this 32 GB Frameo digital frame more! This is the first one I’ve bought for myself, even though I’ve gifted a few to others, and I’m so glad I did. The setup was ridiculously easy—I didn’t even look at the directions! I just downloaded the app and started uploading pictures right away.You can upload photos straight from your camera roll, or if you’re like me and live in Google Photos, you can upload directly from there too—it couldn’t be easier. You can also upload videos *with sound*!If you’re thinking about getting a digital frame, this one’s a no-brainer. Super easy to use, great features, and the perfect way to display all your favorite memories. Highly recommend!
Expected_output: The Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame aligns well with the seller's description and the buyer's review. The seller promises an intuitive 10.1-inch IPS HD touch screen, vibrant visuals, and features such as automatic photo rotation, customizable settings, and built-in 32GB memory. The buyer confirms these features, praising the frame’s ease of setup, app integration, and ability to upload photos and videos with sound effortlessly. The seller's images depict a sleek, modern frame that matches the product shown in the buyer's image. Additionally, the buyer highlights the frame’s advanced features and user-friendliness, which make it ideal for preserving and sharing memories. There are no discrepancies between the seller’s promises and the buyer’s experience, indicating the product meets expectations. Both the buyer's satisfaction and the absence of any reported issues confirm that neither party is at fault, and the seller has delivered as promised.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
